attackStats.name: LUK
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior (4th Job)} val={+15%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+400%}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/thief/nimble-body.png} tip={Nimble Body (1st Job)} val={+20}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/agile-claws.png} tip={Agile Claws (2nd Job)} val={+20}> <bg src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training (2nd Job)} val={+30}>

attackStats.name: Attack
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/spirit-of-the-star.png} tip={Spirit of the Star (3rd Job)} val={+10}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/dark-harmony.png} tip={Dark Harmony (4th Job)} val={+20}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/claw-expert.png} tip={Claw Expert (4th Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/bleed-dart.png} tip={Bleed Dart (Hyper Skill)} val={+50}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/last-resort.png} tip={Last Resort (5th Job)} val={+30}>

attackStats.name: Crit Rate
attackStats.detail: <bg val={Base +5%}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/critical-throw.png} tip={Critical Throw (2nd Job)} val={+50%}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/expert-throwing-star-handling.png} tip={Expert Throwing Star Handling (3rd Job)} val={+20%}>

attackStats.name: Crit Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/critical-throw.png} tip={Critical Throw (2nd Job)} val={+5%}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/alchemic-adrenaline.png} tip={Alchemic Adrenaline (3rd Job)} val={+10%}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/claw-expert.png} tip={Claw Expert (4th Job)} val={+10%}>

attackStats.name: Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/thief/epic-adventure.png} tip={Epic Adventure (Hyper Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/link-skills/thiefs-cunning.png} tip={Thief's Cunning (Link Skill)} val={+18% upon debuffing enemy}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+20%}>

attackStats.name: Boss Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg type={debuff} src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/frailty-curse.png} tip={Frailty Curse (4th Job)} val={+10% within zone}>

attackStats.name: Final Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/expert-throwing-star-handling.png} tip={Expert Throwing Star Handling (3rd Job)} val={+25%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/dark-harmony.png} tip={Dark Harmony (4th Job)} val={+14%}> × <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/shadow-walker.png} tip={Shadow Walk (5th Job)} val={+14% while in Dark Sight}> × <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/last-resort.png} tip={Last Resort (5th Job)} val={+13% in Stage 1} val={+30% in Stage 2}>

attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/dark-harmony.png} tip={Dark Harmony (4th Job)} val={+30%}> × <bg type={debuff} sub={opt} src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/frailty-curse.png} tip={Frailty Curse (4th Job)} val={+30% within zone} subSrc={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/frailty-curse-enhance.png} subTip={Frailty Curse - Enhance (Hyper Skill)} subVal={extra +10%}>

buffInfo.active: <tt src={/class-icons/common/shadow-partner.png} tip={Shadow Partner (3rd Job)} dur={[200s]}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/bleed-dart.png} tip={Bleed Dart (Hyper Skill)} dur={[90s]}>
buffInfo.summons: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/dark-flare.png} tip={Dark Flare (3rd Job)} dur={[60s](60s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/frailty-curse.png} tip={Frailty Curse (4th Job)} dur={[40s]}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/dark-lords-omen.png} tip={Dark Lord's Omen (5th Job)} dur={[12s](90s)}>
buffInfo.buffCd: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/thief/epic-adventure.png} tip={Epic Adventure (Hyper Skill)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/throwing-star-barrage.png} tip={Throwing Star Barrage (5th Job)} dur={[50s](180s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/throw-blasting.png} tip={Throw Blasting (5th Job)} dur={[90s](180s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/last-resort.png} tip={Last Resort (5th Job)} dur={[30s](75s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/shadow-walker.png} tip={Shadow Walker (5th Job)} dur={[30s](180s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}>
buffInfo.binds: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/life-and-death.png} tip={Life and Death (6th Job)} dur={[10s](360s cd)}>
buffInfo.iFrame: <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight (1st Job)} dur={[200s](Special, 0 - 15s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/life-and-death.png} tip={Life and Death (6th Job)} dur={(360s cd)}>

details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Thief to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the town Lith Harbor where Sugar has a quest called 'The Adventure Begins'. Accept the quest and choose the option 'Thief' when prompted

Continue with the story until Lv. 30 as a Thief and talk to Dark Lord to accept a quest called 'The 2 Paths of the Thief'. Complete the quest by choosing the option Assassin and you will be on the path to a Night Lord. Assassin is the 2nd job of Night Lord

build: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/thief/flash-jump.png} tip={Flash Jump}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/thief/nimble-body.png} tip={Nimble Body}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/thief/haste.png} tip={Haste}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/thief/double-stab.png} tip={Double Stab}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/thief/lucky-seven.png} tip={Lucky Seven}>

<tt src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/claw-mastery.png} tip={Claw Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/agile-claws.png} tip={Agile Claws}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/critical-throw.png} tip={Critical Throw}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/gust-charm.png} tip={Gust Charm}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/shuriken-burst.png} tip={Shuriken Burst}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/shadow-leap.png} tip={Shadow Leap}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/shadow-surge.png} tip={Shadow Surge}>

<tt src={/class-icons/common/enveloping-darkness.png} tip={Enveloping Darkness}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/expert-throwing-star-handling.png} tip={Expert Throwing Star Handling}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/alchemic-adrenaline.png} tip={Alchemic Adrenaline}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/spirit-of-the-star.png} tip={Spirit of the Star}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/venom.png} tip={Venom}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/shadow-partner.png} tip={Shadow Partner}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/dark-flare.png} tip={Dark Flare}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/shuriken-challenge.png} tip={Shuriken Challenge}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/triple-throw.png} tip={Triple Throw}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/night-lords-mark.png} tip={Night Lord's Mark}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/claw-expert.png} tip={Claw Expert}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/showdown.png} tip={Showdown}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/shadow-shifter.png} tip={Shadow Shifter}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/dark-harmony.png} tip={Dark Harmony}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/toxic-venom.png} tip={Toxic Venom}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/sudden-raid.png} tip={Sudden Raid}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/quad-star.png} tip={Quad Star}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/frailty-curse.png} tip={Frailty Curse}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/heros-will.png} tip={Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/showdown-enhance.png} tip={Showdown - Enhance}> Showdown - Enhance_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/frailty-curse-boss-rush.png} tip={Frailty Curse - Boss Rush}> Frailty Curse - Boss Rush_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/quad-star-reinforce.png} tip={Quad Star - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/quad-star-boss-rush.png} tip={Quad Star - Boss Rush}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/quad-star-extra-strike.png} tip={Quad Star - Extra Strike}> Quad Star - Reinforce, Boss Rush, and Extra Strike_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/showdown.png} tip={Showdown (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/quad-star.png} tip={Quad Star (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/assassins-mark.png} tip={Assassin's Mark (2nd Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/sudden-raid.png} tip={Sudden Raid (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/death-star.png} tip={Death Star (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/dark-flare.png} tip={Dark Flare (3rd Job)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/shuriken-burst.png} tip={Shuriken Burst (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/gust-charm.png} tip={Gust Charm (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/assassins-mark.png} tip={Assassin's Mark (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/dark-flare.png} tip={Dark Flare (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/triple-throw.png} tip={Triple Throw (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/shuriken-challenge.png} tip={Shuriken Challenge (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/quad-star.png} tip={Quad Star (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/sudden-raid.png} tip={Sudden Raid (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/showdown.png} tip={Showdown (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/death-star.png} tip={Death Star (Hyper Skill)}>

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to spicedcuttlefish and the members of the Night Lord Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Boost Nodes Build + Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build

extraContent.title: Dark Sight
extraContent.content:
Credits to the Night Walker Discord for the list of attacks avoidable with Dark Sight. For an actively maintained version, please check out the Night Walker Discord

In 1st Job, Dark Sight is unlocked that allows you to dodge certain attacks. Below is a list of avoidable attacks that have been tested:

BossAvoidable Attack
All EnemiesTouch Damage
HillaLightning Bolt, Flame Breath
CygnusAll minions (including instructors) touch damage + attacks
UrsusFalling Debris
Princess No(Miroku/4F - All attacks except Infinite Flame), Butterfly Throw (except Black Butterfly Seduce), Sakura Shower
MagnusImmobilizing Gas, Falling Debris, Dash
PapulatusHand Smash, Floor Rift, Timed Cursed/Seal (both cast + seal), Falling Debris
GolluxReverse/99% Bomb
Crimson QueenBurn DoT (gain stacks but no damage taken)
PierreFalling Hats, Fire Spin (Blue Form)
Von BonFalling Debris
VellumFalling Stun Rocks
Pink Bean (Statuses)All attacks except Laser, Poison Clouds, Mini Pink Beans
Pink BeanBlue ground attack, Big Bang, Mini Pink Beans
LotusP2 Stun Debris
DamienYellow(p1)/Red(p2) Falling Fireballs, Dash(p2), Thorn Bind (Can be done reactively when he disappears w/ Monster Silhouettes enabled in settings)
WillP1 (Segment Test) Red Meteors, P2 Web, P2 Dash
Guardian Angel SlimeSlime Pool DoT, Slime minion touch damage (not their attacks, i.e. Pink Slime's seduce), Magma Slime touch + landing on head
Verus HillaCorpse DoT
GloomFalling Debris
DarknellDebris (Both Vertical + Horizontal), Small Minion touch damage (except sword swing)
Black MageP1 Knights' Dash (still applies curse), P1 Red Lightning, Falling Debris (Vertical), Diagonal/Rolling Debris (only while midair), P3 Down FMA
SerenDash, Falling Debris (P1, P2 Sunset); still adds sun gauge

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/77/An_Arrangement_from_the_Goddess%2E} title={"An Arrangement from the Goddess"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Double Stab
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Damage: 165%, Number of Attacks: 2, Enemies Hit: 5
primary.desc: Stab inplace damaging enemies around you
details: Only usable when equipped with a Dagger

primary.name: Lucky Seven
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Throwing Star Cost: 2, Damage: 110%, Enemies Hit: 5, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Throws a barrage of stars forward
details: Only usable when equipped with a Claw

primary.name: Haste
primary.shortDesc: Speed: +40, Jump: +20, Max Speed: +20

primary.name: Dark Sight
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, hides in the shadows for 200 seconds.\nWhen Dark Sight is deactivated, cooldown increased per attack dodged: 3 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.
primary.desc: While active, you cannot hit or be hit by enemies
details: While active, pressing the Skill Key again or using an attack will cancel Dark Sight
You can use <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/thief/flash-jump.png} tip={Flash Jump (1st Job)}> while in Dark Sight
Has a cooldown (3 secs, stacks up to 5 times) per attack dodged

primary.name: Flash Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 12, jumps further, able to use 2 times consecutively.
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
Can be used twice in a row

primary.name: Nimble Body
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases LUK by 20

primary.name: Shuriken Burst
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 18 and 3 throwing stars. Deals 560% damage to up to 1 enemies. Upon striking an enemy, detonates in place dealing 105% damage 6 times to up to 6 enemies.
primary.desc: Throws several shurikens forward that explodes damaging nearby enemies

primary.name: Gust Charm
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 17 and 2 throwing stars, Damage: 245%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Knockback Range: 350
primary.desc: Creates a gust of wind that pushes enemies back

primary.name: Assassin's Mark
primary.shortDesc: Grants a 40% chance to leave a mark on attack. Attacking again will produce 2 Throwing Stars to deal 150% damage
primary.desc: While toggled, your attacks have a chance to create homing throwing stars that attack nearby enemies
details: Throwing stars will prioritize enemies with highest HP first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Shadow Surge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35. Dashes forward a set distance while under the effect of Dark Sight.\nCooldown: 5 sec\nEach attack against an enemy with Assassin's Mark or Night Lord's Mark reduces cooldown: by 1 sec.
primary.desc: Dash forward
details: After dashing, briefly grants the effects of <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight (1st Job)}>
Triggering <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/assassins-mark.png} tip={Assassin's Mark (2nd Job)}> will reduce the cooldown of Shadow Surge
Can be used while casting other skills

primary.name: Shadow Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16. Allows you to leap a greater distance.
primary.desc: Up jump skill

primary.name: Claw Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Claw Mastery: +50%, Throwing Stars: +200
details: Additionally increases the max number of charges each Throwing Star slot can hold

primary.name: Agile Claws
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, Luck: +20

primary.name: Critical Throw
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +50%, Critical Damage: +5%

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases LUK by 30 and DEX by 30

primary.name: Triple Throw
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Throwing Stars Cost: 3, Damage: 290%, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Throw 3 throwing stars at a single enemy
details: Prioritizes enemy with highest HP first

primary.name: Shuriken Challenge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30 and 2 throwing stars. Damage: 260%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Hurls a giant shuriken forward

primary.name: Dark Flare
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Shuriken Summon Duration: 60 sec., that periodically deals 360% damage to 3 enemies nearby. Cooldown: 60 sec.
primary.desc: Creates a damaging field
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Shadow Partner
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 64, summons a shadow that makes an additional hit that is 70% of the final damage for all attacks for 200 sec
primary.desc: Creates a clone that mimics your attacks, increasing the number of hits you deal per attack
details: The clone's attack deals reduced %Final Damage
Does not mimic summoning skills and 5th Job Common Skills

primary.name: Spirit of the Star
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +10. Enables use of skills without consuming Throwing Stars.
details: Uses the Throwing Star with the highest Attack to calculate your damage
Not usable if there are no Throwing Stars in your inventory

primary.name: Enveloping Darkness
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +20%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%

primary.name: Venom
primary.shortDesc: Status Chance: 30%, Damage Over Time: 90% damage every 1 sec for 6 sec
primary.desc: Grants a chance for your attacks to apply a poisoning debuff

primary.name: Expert Throwing Star Handling
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +25%, Critical Rate: +20%

primary.name: Alchemic Adrenaline
primary.shortDesc: Recovery Amount: +170%, Critical Damage: +10%, Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Quad Star
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 26, Throwing Stars Cost: 4, Damage: 540%, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Throws 4 throwing stars at a single enemy
details: Prioritizes enemy with highest HP first

primary.name: Showdown
primary.shortDesc:
MP 50, Stars Consumed: 3.
Attack up to 6 enemies with 708% damage 2 times, then provoke by creating 6 shurikens.
The provoked enemies become untouchable. For 140 sec, acquired EXP and Item Drop Rate increases by 5%. Effect halved for bosses.
Shurikens attack 6 times for 24% damage. If a single enemy is hit by several shurikens at the same time, Final Damage decreases by 50%, starting with the second shuriken. Damage Against Normal Enemies: +200%
Shuriken Cooldown: 5 sec.
primary.desc: Hurl an exploding dagger forward that debuffs enemies
details: [Debuff]: Increases %EXP and Item Drop Rate against this enemy and the enemy cannot deal touch damage to you<bp_Effects are halved for bosses_>

Periodically, the attack will create homing shurikens<bp_Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters_Enemies hit by multiple shurikens take reduced %Final Damage after the first shuriken_Unaffected by Damage Reflect_>

primary.name: Night Lord's Mark
primary.shortDesc: Leave a mark on attack at 60% chance. Attacking again will produce 3 Throwing Stars to deal 255% damage.
details: Increases activation chance, number of Throwing Stars created, and %Damage

primary.name: Sudden Raid
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 290, Throwing Stars Cost: 1, Damage: 494%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 7, Damage Over Time: 210% damage every 1 sec for 10 sec, Cooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Unleashes a devastating large attack that applies a damaging debuff
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Frailty Curse
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 41, lasts for 40 sec. Reduces Attack Power and Defense by 30% and Movement Speed by -60 for enemies, excluding Boss Monsters.\n[Passive Effect: Increases Damage When Attacking Bosses by 10%]
primary.desc: Creates a debuff zone that reduces enemy %Attack, %DEF, and Movement Speed
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Boss Damage
Does not apply to bosses (unless you have Hyper Skill passive <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/frailty-curse-boss-rush.png} tip={Frailty Curse - Boss Rush (Hyper Skill)}>)
Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Dark Harmony
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +20, Ignore Defense: +30%, Final Damage: +14%

primary.name: Shadow Shifter
primary.shortDesc: Dodge Chance: 45%, Knockback Resistance: +60%

primary.name: Toxic Venom
primary.shortDesc: Poison Chance: 50%, 160% damage every 1 sec for 8 sec, can be stacked 3 times
details: Increases debuff chance, duration, and %Damage
Can now be stacked (up to 3 times)

primary.name: Claw Expert
primary.shortDesc: Claw Mastery: +70%. Attack Power: +30, Critical Damage: +10%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage

hyperPassive.name: Showdown - Reinforce
details: Does not apply to homing shurikens created

hyperPassive.name: Showdown - Spread
details: Does not apply to homing shurikens created

hyperPassive.name: Showdown - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: EXP Obtained and Item Drop Rate: +5%

hyperPassive.name: Frailty Curse - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Additional 10% Attack Power and Defense reduction.

hyperPassive.name: Frailty Curse - Boss Rush
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Frailty Curse is applied to bosses.

hyperActive.name: Bleed Dart
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Duration: 90 sec, Attack Power: +50.\nBleed Chance: 100%, Bleed Damage: 2000% damage every sec, Bleed Duration: 3 sec
hyperActive.desc: Grants flat Attack and causes your attacks to apply a damaging debuff
details: Right-clicking the skill will toggle the visual effect ON/OFF

hyperActive.name: Death Star
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Throwing Stars Cost: 1, Damage: 358%, Number of Attacks: 7, Max Enemies Hit: 8\nCooldown: 14 sec\n[Passive Effect - Night Lord's Mark Damage: +100% points]
hyperActive.desc: Creates a giant shuriken that damages nearby enemies
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases the %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/night-lords-mark.png} tip={Night Lord's Mark (4th Job)}> by a flat amount

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nApplies to any Explorer class in the party\nCooldown: 120 sec.

fifthMain.name: Throwing Star Barrage
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 50 sec. Throwing skills gain extra spread.
Triple Throw attacks in 4 extra directions, with extra projectiles dealing 290% damage
Quad Star attacks in 3 extra directions, with extra projectiles dealing 370% damage
Cooldown: 180 sec.
fifthMain.desc: While active, using <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/triple-throw.png} tip={Triple Throw (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/quad-star.png} tip={Quad Star (4th Job)}> will throw additional throwing stars in a spread
details: Does not apply to <tt src={/class-icons/common/shadow-partner.png} tip={Shadow Partner (3rd Job)}>

fifthMain.name: Shurrikane
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 800. Throwing Stars Cost: 1, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 615%, Number of Attacks: 7
A huge shuriken flies forward striking foes, dealing additional damage for 2 sec before disappearing. Using the skill again while the shuriken is flying will stop it immediately at its current location
40% of normal chance to trigger Assassin's Mark.
Cooldown: 25 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Throw forward a giant shuriken that continuously spins in place before disappearing
details: Pressing the Skill Key again while the shuriken is active will stop it immediately at its current location
Has a reduced chance to trigger <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/night-lord/assassins-mark.png} tip={Assassin's Mark (2nd Job)}>
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Dark Lord's Omen
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, shoot 6 Throwing Star(s) per 1 enemy for 12 sec, dealing 1370% damage to max 7 enemies
7 additional Throwing Stars are launched regardless of the number of enemies.
Boss Damage: +30%
The scroll explodes when the skill duration ends, dealing 3430% damage with 12 additional attacks. Max Enemies Hit: 12
Cooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates a giant orb that periodically launches out throwing stars
details: At the end of the Skill, the orb explodes dealing damage to nearby enemies
Attack has increased %Boss Damage
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Throw Blasting
fifthMain.shortDesc: Explosive Charm: explosion occurs around enemy hit by skill that throws shurikens up to 6 enemies with 1045% damage 5 times\nPassive Effect: 1 explosive charm is prepared every 10 sec and activates. Active and Passive Effects cannot trigger simultaneously.\nActive Effect: MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 60 sec, Usable Explosive Charms: 68, uses min 2 and max 4 charms per attack skill, Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Throwing Star attacks gain Explosive Talismans that explode and damage nearby enemies
details: [Passive]: Prepares 1 Explosive Talisman for use every 10 seconds
When Active Effect is used, gain multiple Explosive Talismans for the duration of the buff<bp_Each attack can consume a min. of 2 and max. of 4 Explosive Talismans_>
Passive and Active Effect cannot be active at the same time
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Throwing Stars Cost: 4, Damage: 750%, Number of Attacks: 4. When 3 attacks land, the next attack triggers an enhanced HEXA Quad Star.\n------Enhanced HEXA Quad Star------\nMP Cost: 35, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 990%, Number of Attacks: 4
